replies.msg:
175ä¿‚æœ€ä½è¦æ±‚
170-174 å¯ä»¥é éšä»”æ­å¤ 
ä½é170 è¦æ‹ç™½å¡
å…¶å¯¦é«˜éä½ æœ‰å’©å””å¥½ï¼Ÿ æœ‰æ¢å¥³é«˜éä½ ä½†åˆè·Ÿä½ ï¼Œæ˜¯ä½ æœ‰æœ¬äº‹ï¼Œ å…¶ä»–äººç¾¨æ…•ä½ éƒ½å””åˆ‡å•¦

My friend Paul is 175cm tall. Last week he married Clara, his girlfriend from Tinder. I said "wishing you a lifetime of love and happiness!" My elder brother wrote "best wishes on this wonderful journey as you build your new lives together!" My younger brother wrote "Thank you for letting us share in this joyful day. We wish you all the best as you embark on this wonderful union!" My sister wrote "congratulations on finding each other. Your greatest adventure has just begun" My cousin said "wishing you fulfillment of every dream" Paul honours his parents and is thankful for what they've done for him. His sister is also a good daughter while his brother needs to be a better son. In the east parents and teachete stress the importance of filial piety which means chinese parental respect. They teach that you should honour your parents and take care of them. Paul's cousin has stolen his watchstrap lately. It was a point of honour to tell him about it. My brother felt honour bound to tell him too. His dad is a man of honor and high integrity. Both Paul and I are kickboxing fans. In February Fred will be fighting chris for the heavyweight title for the honour of his country. Winning it is a matter of personal honour, family honor and national honor. Last sunday his church held a banquet in honor of Fred. Paul asked me if I would do him the honoir of accompanying him to the banquet which I did. It was a signal honour to meet Fred. When he saw us he said humbly "it's a great honour to have you here paul" We asked him if he would do us the honour of being our grappling coach. He said "we'll see" A couple of waiters did the honours and greeted the guests at the door. After we sat down Fred said to a waitress "will you do the honours and cut us a piece if chicken?" Fred said to us "I would be honoured if you could come and see my fight in February." We gave him an affirmative response. Last year Dana said to him "I would be honoured if you attended the hall of fame ceremony." which he did. He was honoured for his performance in his last match. Besides winning the championship he was honoured with an award for excellence in wrestling. By the way many people bought front row tickets for the next kickboxing event at half price or less due to a computer error but the organisation stated they would honour these tickets nevertheless which could cost up to a million dollars in lost earnings.

replies.msg: I think it's ok. Say the following to your girlfriend: You're gorgeous, cute and pretty. You're the best thing that has ever happened to me. Your love is what keeps me going every day. It's awesome to spend my life with you. I'm looking forward to spending the rest of our lives together. Last night I sent an angel to look over you as you slept. The angel returned to me and when I asked why? The angel said that angels do not watch over angels. This morning I went to the hospital and got an x-ray, do you know what they found? You in my heart. The doctor said my heart will always be fine with you in it.
